question: Which state launch the Rooftop Solar Project through the net-metering system?
explanation: Odisha Government launched a grid-connected rooftop solar programme through the net-metering system at the State Secretariat in the capital city of Bhubaneshwar. It is being implemented by Odisha Renewable Energy Development Agency (OREDA). The program mainly aims at harnessing renewable solar capacity through people's participation to further strengthen the grid and reduce power losses.
